title: PHPsqrt()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPsqrt()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Return the square root of different numbers: "); echo(sqrt(1) . "
"); echo(sqrt(9) . "
"); echo(sqrt(0.64) . "
"); echo(sqrt(-9)); ?> Definition and Usage The sqrt() function returns the square root of a number. Syntax sqrt( number ); Parameter Values Parameter Description number Required. Specifies a number Technical Details Return Value: The square root of number , or NAN for negative numbers Return Type: Float PHP Version: 4+ ★ +1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPsqrt()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPsqrt()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPsqrt()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
